Strops:ButchersBlade.NAME: Butcher's Blade
Strops:ButchersBlade.FLAVOR: Holding it makes you find the weights of lives up to you to handle.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, if the first #b%d card you play is an #yAttack, it goes back to your hand.

Strops:InsanityStone.NAME: Insanity Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b%d #yMadness to your hand.

Strops:HermitsTiara.NAME: Hermit's Tiara
Strops:HermitsTiara.FLAVOR: Think of my help, forgive my limitations.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yStrength at the start of each combat. If you have #b%d or fewer relics, gain #b%d more.

Strops:Bolster.NAME: Bolster
Strops:Bolster.FLAVOR: Prepare to face the mighty Bolster!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yStrength at the start of each combat. If you have #b%d or more relics, gain #b%d more.

Strops:Polearm.NAME: Polearm
Strops:Polearm.FLAVOR: What will happen if my polearm poses a conflict with your thorns?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b%d #yThousand #yCuts. Enemies start with #b%d #yThorns.

Strops:Fractal.NAME: Fractal
Strops:Fractal.FLAVOR: Too many Body Slams may pollute your card piles? Don't worry, once you collect 3 of them in your hand, they will merge into a Body Slam++ automatically.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the #b%dst turn of each combat, add a #yBody #ySlam+ into your hand, draw pile and discard pile. At the start of the #b%dnd turn of each combat, add a #yBody #ySlam+ into your hand.
At the start of the first #b%d turns of each combat, add a #yBody #ySlam+ into your hand.

Strops:IcyTouch.NAME: Icy Touch
Strops:IcyTouch.FLAVOR: For icy that also means frozen, so it also gets triggered after you get 5 of your minions dead.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b%d #yAttacks in a single turn, #yChannel #b%d #yFrost.

Strops:Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
Strops:Transcendence.FLAVOR: A bright self, a clear world.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. After you play the card, if it's one of the first #b%d cards played that turn, #ystrops:Exclude the rest of cards in your hand
Choose a card to combine with
After you play
, if it's one of the first #b%d cards played that turn, #ystrops:Exclude the rest of cards in your hand
, then draw that many cards
, then gain #b%dx that much #yBlock
, then draw that many cards and gain #b%dx that much #yBlock

Strops:SanityMaintenanceApparatus.NAME: Sanity Maintenance Apparatus
Strops:SanityMaintenanceApparatus.FLAVOR: I thought it should be used only in case of SAN crisis and never expected a low-HP use... Wait?
DESCRIPTIONS: During combats against normal enemies, your HP has a lower limit of #b%d.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:HungrySun.NAME: Hungry Sun
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b%d HP loss in each non-combat room heals you instead at a #b%d%% ratio.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:SunflowerInASummer.NAME: Sunflower in A Summer
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose one: Change all the #y? rooms in the second Act into #yCampfire ones; ALSO change all the #yNormal #yEnemy rooms there into #rElite ones; or obtain #b%d special potion.
Note
This relic will only spawn on Act 1.

Strops:Atri.NAME: Atri
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, any Energy gained past #b%d changes into draw of that much. Cards drawn this way cost #b%d less until played.

Strops:DepartmentStore.NAME: Department Store
Strops:DepartmentStore.FLAVOR: In front of the department store, I started an experience that marked a major departure from routine.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. End your turn on your Energy decreasing to ZERO.

Strops:TheCrow.NAME: The Crow
Strops:TheCrow.FLAVOR: For the period of dusk, I‘ll be here with you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b%d #rStrength #rDown and #b%d #yRitual. If you have #yCultist #yHeadpiece, also gain #b%d #ystrops:Ritual_of_Ritual.

Strops:GrassNowAndFlowersThen.NAME: Grass Now And Flowers Then
Strops:GrassNowAndFlowersThen.FLAVOR: To enlighten, to shield, and to empower.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add #b%d #yGift #yof #yArcane to your deck.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:SiphonGem.NAME: Siphon Gem
Strops:SiphonGem.FLAVOR: Certainly, we can present you with the whole ticket. The remaining matters are no more than how to get to that door, and how to follow the performance behind it.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]usable [#2aecd7]time [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]Run NL Obtain a random key that's still missing. NL #pstrops:Tricolor : gain #b%d #ygold instead.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Act 4.

Strops:Upgrade.NAME: Upgrade
Strops:Upgrade.FLAVOR: The great waves advance and rise, one by one!
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]out [#2aecd7]of [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]usable [#2aecd7]times [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]Run NL Consume all your #yGold. For every #b%d #yGold consumed by this effect, obtain one of the following relics, chosen randomly: 1 - a #yVirja; 2 - an #yOddly #ySmooth #yStone; 3 - a #yGolden #yIdol; 4 - a #yStarberry.
Note
1. When used, any #yGold remaining last that fails to reach #b%d will be wasted. NL 2. This relic won't spawn in shops or on Act 4.

Strops:Key.NAME: Key
Strops:Key.FLAVOR: Free your mind from its bonds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. If an event has more than one available option, lock the first available one.
Note
This relic will interact in a special way with the event "Mind Bloom".
[Locked] Due to: Key.

Strops:FilmStarryCurtain.NAME: Film -Starry Curtain-
Strops:FilmStarryCurtain.FLAVOR: It’s amazing grace, created by some of the residents together in a town.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each turn after draw, add #yAurora to your hand until it is full.

Strops:SoulStitch.NAME: Soul Stitch
Strops:SoulStitch.FLAVOR: Once worn, the devil’s whispers echo around your ears.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, set your Max HP to (the number of #yAttacks in your deck minus #b%d [REMOVE_SPACE]) times #b%d , and heal fully instead (works once).
Note
This relic will be triggered before #yLizard #yTail and #yFairy #yin #ya #yBottle.
When you would die, set your Max HP to (the number of #yAttacks in your deck plus #b%d [REMOVE_SPACE]) times #b%d , and heal fully instead (works once).

Strops:ZhelpArcaneTalents.NAME: Tool Relic: Gift of Arcane
Strops:ZhelpArcaneTalents.FLAVOR: This relic will NOT spawn in game at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yGifts #yof #yArcane cost #b%d , have a damage number of #b%d and #b%d before and after #yUpgrade respectively, and their #ystrops:Turnthirst threshold and bonus equal #b%d and #b%d respectively.

Strops:ZhelpFrostTalents.NAME: Tool Relic: Gift of Frost
Strops:ZhelpFrostTalents.FLAVOR: This relic will NOT spawn in game at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yGifts #yof #yFrost cost #b%d , have a #yBlock number of #b%d and #b%d before and after #yUpgrade respectively, and their #ystrops:Turnthirst threshold and bonus equal #b%d and #b%d respectively.

Strops:ZhelpFireTalents.NAME: Tool Relic: Gift of Fire
Strops:ZhelpFireTalents.FLAVOR: This relic will NOT spawn in game at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yGifts #yof #yFire cost #b%d , have a magic number of #b%d and #b%d before and after #yUpgrade respectively, and their #ystrops:Turnthirst threshold and bonus equal #b%d and #b%d respectively.

Strops:DarkEnergyLantern.NAME: Dark Energy Lantern
Strops:DarkEnergyLantern.FLAVOR: To me has given black energy the night, so I use it to create light.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b%d time you #yEvoke a #yDark #yChanneled this turn or last turn, draw #b%d cards.

Strops:Ribbon.NAME: Ribbon
Strops:Ribbon.FLAVOR: Yes, it's a taste of fairy tales and sweets!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b%d times you gain a buff, remove randomly #b%d of your debuffs.

Strops:GlassRod.NAME: Glass Rod
Strops:GlassRod.FLAVOR: Every glass rod is waiting for its crucible, the same way that every crucible is waiting for its glass rod.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b%d cards you #yUpgrade in your deck, you may remove a card from your deck.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 41 or higher.

Strops:DelayedGratification.NAME: Delayed Gratification
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you would gain Energy during your turn, it's delayed until the start of your next turn. At the start of each combat, gain #b%d [E] .

Strops:WeatherControlDevice.NAME: Weather Control Device
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add #b%d #yLightning #yStorm to your deck.

Strops:ZhelpLightningStorm.NAME: Tool Relic: Lightning Storm
Strops:ZhelpLightningStorm.FLAVOR: This relic will NOT spawn in game at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLightning #yStorms cost #b%d, have a multiplying ratio of #b%d, and #yChannel #b%d guaranteed #yLightning after #yUpgraded.

Strops:Lemonade.NAME: Lemonade
Strops:Lemonade.FLAVOR: Why not drink it and enjoy a cool summer?
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time your Energy reaches or exceeds #b%d each turn, draw #b%d card. The next combat and every #b%d combats after will drop a bonus reward of #b%d #yEnergy #yPotion.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:BambooDragonflyOfHanyuHorner.NAME: Bamboo Dragonfly of Hanyu Horner
Strops:BambooDragonflyOfHanyuHorner.FLAVOR: To be filled in? I think the poem has already been here getting composed.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot draw more than #b%d cards per turn.

Strops:ProfiteeringMerchant.NAME: Profiteering Merchant
Strops:ProfiteeringMerchant.FLAVOR: The mask seems to get corrupt soon after it came into the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose one: The Merchant will have all its relics discounted by #b%d%% ; or the Merchant will only sell #yRare relics, but with them discounted by #b%d%%.
Note
This relic won't spawn in shops or on Act 4.

Strops:ProfiteeringMerchantAttempted.NAME: Profiteering Merchant (Attempted)
Strops:ProfiteeringMerchantAttempted.FLAVOR: You chose to dress yourself in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yProfiteering #yMerchant. The Merchant will have all its relics discounted by #b%d%%.

Strops:ProfiteeringMerchantAchieved.NAME: Profiteering Merchant (Achieved)
Strops:ProfiteeringMerchantAchieved.FLAVOR: You chose to dress the Merchant in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yProfiteering #yMerchant. The Merchant will only sell #yRare relics, but with them discounted by #b%d%%.

Strops:ToxicLump.NAME: Toxic Lump
Strops:ToxicLump.FLAVOR: Don’t say it’s toxic. Just say it’s kind of mysterious, will you?
DESCRIPTIONS: During a combat, for every #b%d HP lost while you're in #yWrath, gain #b%d Max HP at the end of the combat.
Note
1. This relic won't spawn on on Floor 44 or higher. NL 2. This works at most #r5 times for each combat.

Strops:PlagueStopwatch.NAME: Plague Stopwatch
Strops:PlagueStopwatch.FLAVOR: Since sanguine is such an unpleasant word, we‘re now considering replacing it with plague.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, you may add #b%d #yEnvenom+ to your deck. For every #b%d cards you play, trigger #yPoison on ALL enemies.
Upon pickup, you may add #b%d #yEnvenom to your deck. For every #b%d cards you play, trigger #yPoison on ALL enemies.

Strops:SoulCannon.FLAVOR: There was once a time when souls' value could be measured by cobs.

Strops:Bindings.NAME: Bindings
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, the first #b%d #yAttack you play that has a target gets its damage increased by #b%d , and sets the #yBlock of its target to 1 after effected.

Strops:WhiteDClips.NAME: White D-Clips
Strops:WhiteDClips.FLAVOR:
Nep! Anyway the cutest is me no doubt 
(/>v<)/!?
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%.1fx #yAttack damage to enemies with #yBlock. NL strops:tricolor : Deal #b%.1fx instead.
Note
This relic won't spawn at Spear & Shield.
Deal #b%.0fx #yAttack damage to enemies with #yBlock. NL strops:tricolor : Deal #b%.0fx instead.

Deal #b%.0fx #yAttack damage to enemies with #yBlock. NL strops:tricolor : Deal #b%.1fx instead.

Strops:RestrainedHeart.NAME: Restrained Heart
Strops:RestrainedHeart.FLAVOR: Is it an urge of destruction, or an unconscious dream.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you need to discard during your turn, you may choose to discard one fewer card.
Note

This only works for unconditional discard. [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click to switch between ready and unready. NL #yAll #ydiscard: You'll be asked which card to keep (optional). NL #ySelective #ydiscard: You're allowed to finish after selecting one fewer card. NL #yRandom #ydiscard: If this is ready, one fewer card will be discarded automatically.
prevent being discarded

Strops:SteamEpic.NAME: Steam Epic
Strops:SteamEpic.FLAVOR: I prefer to call it Steam Rare.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b%d non- #yStatus non- #rCurse cards with #yExhaust each combat are #yRetained at the end of turn, and won't get #yExhausted due to #yEthereal.

Strops:FTLEngines.NAME: FTL Engines
Strops:FTLEngines.FLAVOR: Let’s take the initiative to escape! Even though we can’t win the game, we must lead in terms of reactions!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. During non-Boss combats, escape at the end of Turn #b%d receiving no rewards.
Note
This relic will effect after all other onEndTurn effects.

Strops:Decanter.NAME: Decanter
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]out [#2aecd7]of [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]usable [#2aecd7]times [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]Run NL Select one of your Boss relics, negating its next one time of penalty effect.
Note
1. This relic takes an each-specified logic, so it works only for Boss relics in base game and this mod. NL 2. This relic won't spawn at Neow.
Current target: #y%s

Strops:ZhelpDecanter.NAME: Tool Relic: Null
Strops:ZhelpDecanter.FLAVOR: This relic will NOT spawn in game at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cancel the current choice of #yDecanter.

Strops:ClockWithNoHands.NAME: Clock with No Hands
Strops:ClockWithNoHands.FLAVOR: In "this" menagerie, "time" flows at a speed 1.4 times as much as the outside.
DESCRIPTIONS: As of the second Act, each Elite combat is replaced by a random one from the previous Act, where the enemies’ Max HP is increased by #b%d%%.
Note
This relic won't spawn at Spear & Shield.

Strops:RainingRuins.NAME: Raining Ruins
Strops:RainingRuins.FLAVOR: This is the last, and also a tour. This is nostalgia, and also a pursuit. This is wandering, and also a pilgrimage. This is tragedy, and also a quest.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]your [#2aecd7]turn [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL #bstrops:Cooldown [#2aecd7]: [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]Combats NL Draw #b%d random card that can draw, and gain #b%d [E] .
Note
This relic actually works in a way of trying to put the card from draw pile into hand. If there's no qualified cards in draw pile, that triggers piles reshuffling and doesn't start Cooldown.

Strops:PhoenixGift.NAME: Phoenix Gift
Strops:PhoenixGift.FLAVOR: Now we wonder where Parting Gift is being.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn without #yBlock, any unblocked attack damage you receive will equally reduce this relic's counter (initially #b%d [REMOVE_SPACE]). When the counter falls to zero, add #b%d random #yRare relic to the current combat's reward, and this no longer works.
Note
1. This relic will only spawn on Act 1 & 2. NL 2. This relic will check the player's Block before all other onEndTurn effects.
Phoenix Hate

Strops:Extractor.NAME: Extractor
Strops:Extractor.FLAVOR: "Extractor" is too long, let's shorten it to "eater".
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you fully block an attack from a non-minion enemy, gain #b%d #yGold at the end of the combat. (Works at most #b%d times for each enemy)
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:Echo.NAME: Echo
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]usable [#2aecd7]times [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]Run NL Obtain the last used potion.

This relic won't spawn at Neow.
i.e. #y%s

Strops:ChuggingMask.NAME: Chugging Mask
Strops:ChuggingMask.FLAVOR: I swung in the center of the dance floor.

Strops:ExitPhase.NAME: Exit Phase

DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]your [#2aecd7]turn [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate NL #bstrops:Cooldown [#2aecd7]: [#ec902a]%d [#2aecd7]Combats NL Escape from a non-boss combat. Whenever you escape from a combat, gain #b%d #yGold.
Note
This relic won't spawn on Floor 44 or higher.

Strops:Maniacal.NAME: Maniacal
Strops:Maniacal.FLAVOR: Congrats for your happy tomorrow, and I myself will go meet my netherworld.
DESCRIPTIONS: Overkill damage increases your #yBlock at a #b%d%% ratio. NL [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]out [#2aecd7]of [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]or [#2aecd7]at [#2aecd7]the [#2aecd7]first [#2aecd7]turn [#2aecd7]in [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]enable/disable NL At the end of each turn, lose #b%d%% of your #yBlock and deal damage #b%d%% of the amount lost to ALL enemies.
Note
1. This relic won't spawn at Spear & Shield. NL 2. This relic will effect after all other onEndTurn effects (except that of #yFTL #yEngines [REMOVE_SPACE]).

Strops:RainbowColoredCircle.NAME: Rainbow-Colored Circle

DESCRIPTIONS: #ystrops:Evade the #b%dth attack you receive each turn.
Note
This relic won't spawn at Spear & Shield.

Strops:BigBangBell.NAME: Big Bang Bell

Note

1. To set off means dragging the card to the specified area on screen and making it hover there for a while until it is #yExcluded. NL 2. [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click to enable/disable. NL 3. You can adjust the required hovering time T(s) in mod config.

Strops:GrabbyHands.NAME: Grabby Hands

Strops:Zan.NAME: Zan

NL The relic can store at most #b%d HP overhealed this way, which can be retrieved any time out of combat.
Note

1. This relic won't spawn on Act 4. NL 2. Retrieve: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]this [#2aecd7]relic to heal as much HP as stored and then clear the storage. NL 3. This works at most #r3 times in each room.

#ystrops:Evade the #b%dth, #b%dth and #b%dth attacks you receive each combat.

Strops:BigBow.NAME: Big Bow
Strops:BigBow.FLAVOR: Big enough for me to fly with? Whether I’m in a shrine, a student union’s office, or a club room, I’m supposed to have the potential, right?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add #b%d #yJust #yLucky to your deck. Whenever you #yScry, draw #b%d card subsequently (at most #b%d times per turn).

Strops:Calculator.NAME: Calculator
Strops:Calculator.FLAVOR: You’ve got the item wrong, which annoyed the Lady Luck. Now, with this thing only, I guess you’ll have to manage to survive upcoming zombie waves all by yourself, on a rainy evening.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%d fewer cards at the start of each turn. [#2aecd7]Each [#2aecd7]time [#2aecd7]you [#2aecd7]right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]this [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]your [#2aecd7]turn, draw a card and add its Cost to this relic's counter this turn (by at least 1). On the counter exceeding #b%d, discard your hand and this no longer works this turn.

Strops:StackedPlate.NAME: Stacked Plate
Strops:StackedPlate.FLAVOR: You can't figure out how it works except for noticing diminishing returns from defense. How come that happens?
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b%d #yPlated #yArmor. Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain #b%d #yPlated #yArmor. At the end of combat, heal #b%d%% of the stack of your #yPlated #yArmor.

Strops:HearthsMores.NAME: Hearth’smores
Strops:HearthsMores.FLAVOR: Gather ‘round the fire for a toasty treat!

Note
Drag the card onto the draw pile to activate.

Strops:SquirrelsRelief.NAME: Squirrels' Relief
Strops:SquirrelsRelief.FLAVOR: “The relief is not bad, but I still want to watch how these little animals get moving with my own eyes.”——Ranwid

This relic will only spawn on Act 1.

To The Draw Pile
Enter the draw pile. The old hand becomes the new discard pile, and the old discard pile becomes the new draw pile.
To The Discard Pile
Enter the discard pile. The old hand becomes the new draw pile, and the old draw pile becomes the new discard pile.
